short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant product alternatives. Go from Big Box to Shop Small.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You shop on Amazon because it’s easy, but you also really want to support small businesses – directly.

With the Shop Smaller for Amazon Chrome extension, shopping small is now a reality.

While browsing Amazon, just click on the S icon and you are instantly shown product alternatives from small business merchants not affiliated with Amazon.

Scroll through the list, and click to be taken directly to the product on the merchant’s site.

It’s that easy.

Shopping small just got big!
